title: Quantum D-modules of toric varieties and oscillatory integrals
abstract: We review mirror symmetry for the quantum cohomology D-module of a compact weak-Fano toric manifold. We also discuss the relationship to the GKZ system, the Stanley-Reisner ring, the Mellin-Barnes integrals, and the Gamma-integral structure.
journal_ref: Handbook of Mirror Symmetry for Calabi-Yau manifolds and Fano manifolds, ALM47, 131-147, (2019)
